alert.note: Alert for Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 1:52AM MDT until May 29 at 2:30AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN MCCOOK...NORTHWESTERN YANKTON...SOUTHEASTERN HANSON... NORTHWESTERN TURNER AND EASTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 252 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Freeman, or 19 miles west of Parker, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Freeman around 300 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Parker, Marion, Bridgewater, Dolton, Monroe, Canistota and Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
